bosses.name: Elder Dragon Greyoll
bosses.info:
Location

In front of Fort Faroth Site of Grace.

Loot

5x Dragon Heart

Tip:

It's useless to attack Greyoll directly. To defeat her you need to defeat five out of the seven Red Eye Dragons around her.

Cheese Tip:

Hide by Greyoll's left leg and attack. Stay hidden until the other dragons stop looking. A weapon with a bleed effect is recommended.

bosses.name: Dragonlord Placidusax
bosses.info:
Location

from "Beside the Great Bridge" Grace site, go down the elevator, walk down stairs and outside, continue straight towards the trees, and look over the edge for a platform.

Jump down on the platforms below until you reach a platform with graves. Look for a "Lie Down" prompt, if you lie down it'll teleport you into Dragonlord Placidusax's arena.

bosses.name: Leda's Questline (1st battle)
bosses.info:
Location

In the center of the bridge. After progressing through Needle Knight Leda's questline, two summon signs will appear.

Helping Leda:

  • Ends Hornsent's Questline
  • Progresses Needle Knight Leda's Questline
  • Falx
  • Hornsent's Armor

Helping Hornsent:

  • Ends Needle Knight Leda's Questline, except the last step.
  • Ash of War: Swift Slash
  • Leda's Rune

Helping neither (skipping the fight):

  • Progresses Leda's Questline (1st battle).

    ONLY IF

    Hornsent is summoned against Messmer the Impaler

bosses.name: Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
bosses.info:
Location

In the back room of Storehouse, First Floor. After progressing through Needle Knight Leda's questline, two summon signs will appear:

Helping Leda:

  • Progresses Needle Knight Leda's questline
  • Ends Sir Ansbach's Questline
  • Ansbach's Longbow
  • Ansbach's Set

Helping Ansbach:

  • Ends Needle Knight Leda's questline, except the last step.
  • Ansbach's Longbow
  • Leda's Rune

Helping neither (skipping the fight):

As Helping Ansbach, without the items.

bosses.name: Thiollier
bosses.info:
After taking St. Trina's poison 4 times she will respond after you die, when you respawn Thiollier will start talking. Once Thiollier is finished talking tell them what St. Trina told you, they will deny that you are the chosen giving you the option to tell them again. Once you told them again talk to them again and they will threaten you. Dying to St. Trina again will give more dialogue with her, once you respawn Thiollier will invade you.

You will get the St. Trina's Smile talisman from this

bosses.name: Needle Knight Leda
bosses.info:
Location

In the Cleansing Chamber. Depending on your choices during questlines, additional characters may be present:

Additional Enemies:

  • Dryleaf Dane: Always. Drops Dane's Footwork
  • Hornsent: If Hornsent's Questline has been progressed until the last step. Drops Hornsent's Armor and Falx.

Potential Allies:

  • Sir Ansbach: If Sir Ansbach's Questline has been progressed until the last step, and you sided with him during Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
  • Sanguine Noble Nataan: If Sir Ansbach's Questline has been progressed until the last step, and you skipped Leda's Questline (2nd battle).

Loot

  • Leda's Sword

bosses.name: Midra, Lord of the Frenzied Flame
bosses.info:
Location

In Midra's Manse, at the end of the trek through the Abyssal Woods.

Loot

  • 410,000 Runes
  • Remembrance of the Lord of Frenzied Flame
